```{r}
library(tidyverse)

dir_root    <- dirname(dirname(dirname(rstudioapi::getActiveDocumentContext()$path)))
dir_helpers <- file.path(dir_root, "bin", "design", "helpers")
dir_data    <- file.path(dir_root, "data", "setup")

source(file.path(dir_helpers, "hd01_generate_deck.R"))

```


```{r}
cart_high <- generate_deck(10, 17)
cart_med  <- generate_deck(10, 33)

write_csv(cart_low, file = file.path(dir_data, "cart_low_risk.csv"))
write_csv(cart_med, file = file.path(dir_data, "cart_med_risk.csv"))
write_csv(cart_high, file = file.path(dir_data, "cart_high_risk.csv"))
```
